article.title: My DIY Smart Thermostat
article.author: Tom Rodrigues
article.excerpt: Controlling your home's temperature has never been easier with smart thermostats. How about making your own?

authors.bio: Hey, I’m Tom. Check out my posts, I’m sure you’ll find something interesting…

next.excerpt: With a growing smart home tech market, many of us want to get involved but are put off by the high price tags. What if you could automate your home for less than $100?
